register.form.title: Register
login.form.title: Sign in
settings.form.title: Settings
home.header.subtitle: Achive your goals by habits & gratitude journal
home.kaizenMeaning.title: What is Kaizen?
home.kaizenMeaning: Kaizen is a Japanese term meaning "Continuous improvement".
home.kaizenMeaning.description: Thanks to Kaizen Journey, you will achieve your goals using the small steps method!
home.feature.habit.title: Habits
home.feature.habit.description: Track your habits, use statistics which are automatically calculated based on streaks and get instant satisfaction during checking habits every day.
home.feature.gratitude.title: Gratitude journal
home.feature.gratitude.description: Helps you to notice more positives and can be treat as a diary. You can easily travel back to specific memories by #tags and filters.
home.feature.friends.title: Friends
home.feature.friends.description: You can show others your habits and gratitudes. Sharing your progress also keeps you motivated.
home.quote.title: Get some inspiration to start your journey!
home.quote.0.text: Small actions are at the heart of kaizen. By taking steps so tiny that they seem trivial or even laughable, you’ll sail calmly past obstacles that have defeated you before. Slowly – but painlessly! – you’ll cultivate an appetite for continued success and lay down a permanent new route to change.
home.quote.0.author: Robert D. Maurer
home.quote.1.text: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
home.quote.1.author: Alan Watts
home.quote.2.text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing. To keep our faces toward change and behave like free spirits in the presence of fate is strength undefeatable.
home.quote.2.author: Helen Keller
home.quote.3.text: Excellence is not a destination; it is a continuous journey that never ends.
home.quote.3.author: Brian Tracy
home.quote.4.text: Growth is painful. Change is painful. But nothing is as painful as staying stuck somewhere you don't belong.
home.quote.4.author: Mandy Hale
home.quote.5.text: Success is the sum of small efforts - repeated day in and day out.
home.quote.5.author: Robert Collier
home.ending.title: Do you want to go on an adventure of your life?
